info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 12:41AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Vernon Parish through 115 AM CST... At 1241 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fullerton to 7 miles west of Cravens. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lacamp, Cravens, Leander and Fullerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for west central Louisiana.
